name: Jumpy Tiles (JMarkGames)
description:
Hello everyone,

i made a simple endless runner game for you to enjoy when you have some free  time! This is my first game, so if you find any bugs or tips i will be happy to listen to them. Anyways thanks to anyone who's going to try it and good luck! Bye!!

Here i paste my game description from Google Play:

Explore the Jumpy Tiles world by going trough different areas and collecting different characters.

Features:
- Explore different areas
- Collect Over 15 characters
- Avoid various obstacles
- Free to play
